ORDER
PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 1
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Thomas THURMAN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 18, 1982.
Decided Dec. 15, 1982.
0. Robert Silverstein, Philadelphia (court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Mariana Coleman Sorenson, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
